sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167320 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , MDXPS_SEIL_NUM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , YN3 , YN4 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM YE167320) , #resnoEncCntn# , #yn# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #plymNm# , #mdxpsPrfClCd# , #scnt# , #useAmt# , #yn2# , #yn3# , #yn4# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167320 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , MDXPS_SEIL_NUM=#mdxpsSeilNum# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , YN=#yn# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , PLYM_NM=#plymNm# , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD=#mdxpsPrfClCd# , SCNT=#scnt# , USE_AMT=#useAmt# , YN2=#yn2# , YN3=#yn3# , YN4=#yn4# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND MDXPS_SEIL_NUM=#mdxpsSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167320 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , MDXPS_SEIL_NUM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , YN3 , YN4 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167320 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND MDXPS_SEIL_NUM=#mdxpsSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , MDXPS_SEIL_NUM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , YN3 , YN4 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167320 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , MDXPS_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167320 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
